text: Hi, I need help with adding personalised tokens for custom objects. How do I add the custom object so i can use it's properties as tokens in email?
The only options for dynamic content are Smart Content (with drag and drop emails) or HubL (with coded emails).

Hi! I'm using personalized tokens for custom objects on Automated emails, how can I test with a specific custom object? Like send a test with the custom object property (I already have the custom object and property with the content I need to test it. )

Make sure the contact is associated to the custom object and send the email perhaps through a live workflow, not just "Send a test email" from the marketing tool.
Would the contact have multiple custom objects associated from the same type?
Iâ€™ll send the test using the live workflow! Thanksssss
i have created a module but the problem i facing is to fetch the contact.name and compare it with object email
